User GuideÂ¶

A brief guide attempting to showcase better the functionality of the mcmodels package. This guide is in no way exhaustive, but aims to describe certain aspects of the package in a more readible format than the API Reference.

  • 1. Data wrangling
    • 1.1. Working with data from the AllenSDK
    • 1.2. Core Package
  • 2. Regressors
    • 2.1. Nonnegative Least Squares Regression
    • 2.2. Nonnparametric Regression
  • 3. Published models
    • 3.1. HomogeneousModel similar to [Oh2014]
    • 3.2. New Voxel-scale Connectivity Model [Knox2018]

Questions

Send any questions using the Send Us a Message link below, or submit your question to StackOverflow using with the 'allen-sdk' tag.

If you encounter any problems using the AllenSDK, please create an issue on Github's issue tracker.
